name: Traffic Control: Game Jam Entry
description:
Made in Construct 3

Instructions: Left-Click to boost vehicle! Right-Click to stop vehicle! Tip: Emergency Vehicles don't stop. Get as high of a score as you can!

Art: https://rebelliousrobot.itch.io/

Coding + SFX: https://shawnthesheep.itch.io/

Music: From Sim City 4 by Jerry Martin
